revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Union Cave |image = [[File:Union Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Union Cave. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City and [[Ruins of Alph]], on Route 32. }} '''Union Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in an 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 14 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 63,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || rowspan=2|[[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Russell || rowspan=2|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=3|[[File:Firebreather.png|40px]] Firebreather Bill || rowspan=3|[[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen || rowspan=3|[[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Larry || rowspan=3|[[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper |}

Base Health |- | rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Lapras.png|40px]] '''Lapras*''' || rowspan=2|<center>450,000 || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Daniel || [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix || rowspan=2|<center>300,000 |- | [[File:Firebreather.png|40px]] Firebreather Ray || [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix |}
'''*Lapras only appears on Fridays after obtaining Fog Badge'''
